articles.title: Bus-sized asteroid to pass Earth by a close margin, says NASA; Know speed, size and more - HT Tech
articles.description: An Apollo group asteroid has been tracked in its orbit and is expected to pass Earth tomorrow, March 7. Know its speed, distance of approach and more, as per NASA.
articles.content: Throughout the first two months of 2024, we have witnessed multiple asteroid approaches to Earth. However, the last few days broke this trend, with no asteroid passing the planet. Normality is expect… [+2191 chars]
